mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (b_title, b_content, author_uid, b_date) VALUES (#{bTitle}, #{bContent}, #{authorUid}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT b.b_no, b.b_title, b.b_content, b.author_uid, u.u_name AS authorName, b.b_date, b.view_count, b.like_count FROM board b JOIN users u ON b.author_uid = u.u_id ORDER BY b.b_date DESC

SELECT b.b_no, b.b_title, b.b_content, b.author_uid, u.u_name AS authorName, b.b_date, b.view_count, b.like_count FROM board b JOIN users u ON b.author_uid = u.u_id ORDER BY b.b_date DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT b.b_no, b.b_title, b.b_content, b.author_uid, u.u_name AS authorName, b.b_date, b.view_count, b.like_count FROM board b LEFT JOIN -- 게시글은 존재하나 혹시 users 테이블에 u_id가 없는 경우도 고려 (일반적으론 FK 제약으로 발생 안함) users u ON b.author_uid = u.u_id WHERE b.b_no = #{bNo}
SELECT like_count FROM board WHERE b_no = #{bNo}
